name: Mass Effect: Bring Down the Sky
name_original: Mass Effect: Bring Down the Sky
description:
Mass Effect: Bring Down the Sky is an action game. It came out on 10-03-2008.
You can play Mass Effect: Bring Down the Sky on Xbox 360 and PC. Casey Hudson directed the game. It was scored by David Kates, Jack Wall, Richard Jacques and Sam Hulick.
